titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out demonstration projects related to providing care for veterans in rural areas.
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out demonstration projects related to providing care for veterans in rural areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) to carry out demonstration projects to examine alternatives for expanding care for veterans in rural areas. Requires a report on such projects.
